products.desc: REGULAR-FIT WATER-REPELLENT JACKET WITH DOUBLE MONOGRAM
products.about: New for Winter 2024, the hooded sweatshirt features the brushed-effect Christian Dior Couture signature in jacquard. Crafted in a black wool blend, it has a classic cut with kangaroo pockets and ribbed finishes. The comfortable hooded sweatshirt will elevate a variety of laid-back looks.
